snippet.title: Disney Frozen Arendelle's Winter Festival for LeapTV - Math Active Learning Game | LeapFrog
snippet.description:
"Take your kids on an enchanted celebration throughout Arendelle with Anna, Elsa and Olaf. Your child will use math skills in active game play to toss snowballs, create beautiful ice sculptures, collect magical snowflakes and trace a path on the ice rink. Whether playing solo or with a friend, the learning level grows with each child!

Explore an icy wonderland on five magical adventures, all throughout the kingdom of Arendelle with this amazing LeapTV learning game that teaches your child numbers, shapes and more math skills.

Bring home the fun, today: http://www.leapfrog.com/en-us/app-center/p/leaptv-disney-frozen-arendelles-winter-festival/_/A-prod39203

LeapFrog creates award-winning educational solutions that delight, engage and inspire children to reach their potential. We know that children learn best when they’re having fun, and that every child learns differently. With solutions that are personalized to each child’s level, every day brings pure learning fun. Visit us at http://www.leapfrog.com/

See more learning tips and videos on our channel: http://www.youtube.com/LeapFrogOfficialSite

Follow LeapFrog on Social
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/LeapFrog
Twitter: http://www.facebook.com/LeapFrog
Pinterest: http://http://www.pinterest.com/LeapFrogInc/
Instagram: http://instagram.com/LeapFrogOfficial"
